name: Not Again! (JustWinginIt)
description:
"Why do I have paintball guns? Why won't they stop firing? Oh no! I've got to go home! Why is this happening again!"

A stealth game where you need to leave the office without destroying everything. Don't get caught, you're on your final warning!

Keyboard Controls: WASD to move, LMB to aim

Gamepad Controls: Left thumbstick move, Right thumbstick to aim

Forgot to add a button to close, Alt f4 to exit.

All programming and art assets created in the Game Jam. Music is royalty free third party.
